entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @WashTimes What has this to do with the crisis at hand? What pelosi wants have no bearings on the pandemic. Where does she think she has the right to hold it up because of more of her vendetta and that is where all of her stupidity and that of her gang comes from. She is hell bent on death
